description.displayText: Betty is personable and responsible. She is responsive to feedback and follows through on requests. Betty is good company, pleasant to talk to and warm in her demeanor.
description.originalText: Betty is personable and responsible. She is responsive to feedback and follows through on requests. Betty is good company, pleasant to talk to and warm in her demeanor.

description.displayText: My mother is very particular about who takes care of her . Betty is patient, kind, respectful and compassionate! She is an awesome caregiver!!!
description.originalText: My mother is very particular about who takes care of her . Betty is patient, kind, respectful and compassionate! She is an awesome caregiver!!!
Our family is very thankful for her assistance with our father.  I highly recommend Betty as a caregiver.

description.displayText: Betty was hired 2 years ago to take care of my Aunt & Uncle. Unfortunately my Aunt passed away leaving my Uncle alone suffering from Dementia. While my Aunt was alive, Betty would help my Aunt with cooking & cleaning which she wasn't hired to do. Now, she takes care of my Uncle. She does whatever it takes to make him happy & keep him smiling. She treats him as a person & not as a job. Unfortunately because of his condition, he has to be put in Hospice. So our loss will become some lucky person's gain. Whoever hires Betty to take care of their loved one will be hiring an amazing woman that will treat their loved one with respect, dignity, & compassion.
description.originalText: Betty was hired 2 years ago to take care of my Aunt & Uncle. Unfortunately my Aunt passed away leaving my Uncle alone suffering from Dementia. While my Aunt was alive, Betty would help my Aunt with cooking & cleaning which she wasn't hired to do. Now, she takes care of my Uncle. description.displayText: We hired Betty to care for my Uncle who has dementia. My Aunt was alive at the time. She was recovering from a broken hip.  Betty and my Aunt became fast friends.  She helped her cook dinner and went to the store to purchase whatever was needed.  Unfortunately my Aunt developed liver cancer and Betty ended up caring for both of them  until my Aunt died.  Betty showed so much compassion toward my Uncle. She would put his favorite music on and would sing and dance with him and he would laugh.  She made my Uncle days pleasant. She went out of her way to blend his food and fed him with a dropper to get nourishment. Whoever hires Betty is hiring Family not just hired help

description.displayText: Betty is a professional.  She took such good care of my mom for several months.  She is caring, compassionate and so motivated.  She anticipated my mom's needs and was so willing to help her anyway possible.  Betty is trustworthy, punctual and polite. Would highly recommend her.
description.originalText: Betty is a professional.  She took such good care of my mom for several months.  She is caring, compassionate and so motivated.  She anticipated my mom's needs and was so willing to help her anyway possible.  Betty is trustworthy, punctual and polite. Would highly recommend her.

description.displayText: I give the highest recommendation to Betty P. She was a caregiver for my husband for more than a year. My husband has early onset Alzheimer's disease and has trouble communicating what he needs. She was patient and insightful in dealing with him. He really enjoyed her company, and they enjoyed listening to music and going for walks. She was completely reliable, always on time and always willing to work extra hours if I needed her. She also helped with light housekeeping and grocery shopping which was a huge help to me. She has the qualities that make for an excellent caregiver - her ability to communicate and bond with my husband made for the best experience for him.
description.originalText: I give the highest recommendation to Betty P. She was a caregiver for my husband for more than a year. She has the qualities that make for an excellent caregiver - her ability to communicate and bond with my husband made for the best experience for him.

description.displayText: Betty came to our home to care for my mom during a time when mom had chronic medical issues.  Betty has been with us for 2 years.  During that time Betty cared for my mom's medical and personal needs. She quickly became a trusted member of our family, helping us get mom on a plan to better health and quality of life .  Betty took care of all medical needs, bathing, exercise, cooking, cleaning, transportation, and shopping.  She is always willing to help any of us. Betty takes mom for walks to the beach/ice cream.  Extremely caring, flexible, trustworthy and pays attention to details.  During medical emergencies, Betty remained calm, and was able to quickly assess the situation to provide input to us.  We trusted Betty to represent us during emergencies if needed.  She built a strong bond with our family, but we now need live -in help.  If you need an incredible home care professional and quality person to trust, that is Betty.  We are sad to see her go, she has been a blessing to us.

description.displayText: Betty is very patient and understanding. She helped with my mother who has Alzheimer's and she was there early and helped mom get her day started. She was also there to help take mom to the library which she loves. I was very comfortable with Betty helping with my mom when I wasn't able to because of work.Betty's calm and quiet demeanor was an asset to our family because mom can be quite stubborn. I would recommend Betty with very high regards.
